title: Ep 348: Comedy is Violent
itunes:title: Ep 348: Comedy is Violent
description:
Bobby learns the value of mahogany. Khalyla can't hear Moana. We talk comedy allies & enemies, tainted tennis balls, Laugh Factory choke outs, and the most famous heckler comeback of the 80s.  

You can get $20 off your first purchase with promo code belly at www.seatgeek.com or on the SeatGeek app.

TigerBelly listeners get 10% off their first month at www.betterhelp.com/belly
